definition: a lever or wheel controlling the rudder of a ship for steering, the entire apparatus for steering a ship
position of the helm with respect to the amidships position

examples: a new dean is at the helm of the medical school

definition: to direct (a ship) with a lever or wheel that controls the rudder : to direct (a ship) with or as if with a helm (see helm entry 1 sense 1a) : steer

examples: the director has helmed many action movies

definition: to cover or furnish with a helmet
